name: The Griblings
description:
A student project for Studio 694, WCG's in-house game development studio. Developed by Guvi Sangha and Charlie James.

The Griblings is a short tech demo / proof of concept psychological horror game. You play as Alister Gribling, a man who suffers from ongoing hallucinations. Help Alister escape the house and avoid his nightmares.

Comments and feedback: @WCGamesArt

Studio 694 is a student-led game studio operated as part of WCG's Foundation Degree in Games Art course.
